 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָצַע‎</span> **verb** ==scrape, scrape off== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְצִיעָה‎</span> = Biblical Hebrew, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְצִיעֲהָא‎</span>, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***fine dust***); — 

**Hiph\`il** ***id. Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתהַֿבַּיִת יַקְצִעַ‎</span> [[Lev.14.41|Lev 14:41]].
